author: jorton
msg: fails with EINTR and die_now has been set (indicating a graceful
stop/restart), terminate the child quickly rather than re-entering

author: rjung
msg: Use two instances of maps in uri worker map.
When we do dynamic reloading, we switch between the two.
- update needs to be atomic, so we need a place to
prepare the new maps, before making them active
- maps not needed any longer should free their memory
Until now, when we reload, we first remove maps from the
list (and will throw service errors for those URIs)
before we reload. Also we never give back memory.

msg: when version is defined in plugin-management section, we need to use it in mojo binding.
